flawed_nl_solution:
Each week, David will spend 3 hours + 3 hours + 4 hours = <<3+3+4=9>>9 hours in class.
Add to that his 4 hours of small group work, 4 + 9 = <<4+9=13>>13 hours a week.
He will spend 13 hours x 24 weeks = <<13*24=312>>312 hours on the course.
#### 312

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
